title: ISM's Holcomb: Companies Continuing to Cut Inventories (Audio)

description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Brad Holcomb, Chairman of the Manufacturing Business Survey at the Institute for Supply Management, on the April ISM report.
